headline.main: How the AP-NORC Poll on American Identity Was Conducted
headline.print_headline: How the AP-NORC Poll on American Identity Was Conducted

lead_paragraph: The Associated Press-NORC Center for Public Affairs Research poll on the national identity of the United States was conducted by NORC from Feb. 16-20. It is based on online and telephone interviews of 1,004 adults who are members of NORC's nationally representative AmeriSpeak panel.
